by RoiFuries; 2024.

Nike - Tiempo de ser Héroes

  • Set Decoration Department
  • Advertising

With 'Time to Be Heroes,' Nike aims to promote the growth of sports in Mexico, particularly in Mexico City. To achieve this, it narrates the stories of everyday heroes who are close to us and inspire us to celebrate the passion of an athlete.

  • Producer:The Lift, Superprime.
  • Agency: JDI México.
  • Client: Nike
